Name: Distorted Illusions
About the game: Distorted Illusions is a free and relaxing block puzzle game. Distorted Illusions Free features: - 2 game modes (Block Slide and Block Swap) - 3x3 puzzle difficulty for both game modes - Leaderboards based on least number of moves - 6 different puzzles - 8 relaxing music tracks - 65 achievements Distorted Illusions Premium features: - 40+ different puzzles - Puzzle difficulties 3x3 to 12x12 for both game modes - Import your own custom puzzles Planned for the future: - More puzzles - More achievements - More environments - Visibility of raw leaderboards - Better controller support
